synopsis.text: In the special episode of the anime "Shiguang Dailiren" or "Link Click," our protagonists, Lu Guang and Cheng Xiaoshi, take on an unusual task at their Time Photo Studio. They are approached by Liu Siwen, a man desperate to marry his beloved Ouyang. However, there's a catch. Ouyang's father, a formidable martial arts master, is skeptical of outsiders and will only bless the union if Siwen can defeat him in combat. After years of failed attempts, Siwen turns to Lu Guang and Cheng Xiaoshi for help. Using their unique ability to enter photographs and travel into the past, the duo devises a strategy to decipher the master's distinct martial arts techniques. Will they succeed in their mission and help Siwen win his future father-in-law's approval? Tune in to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
